data.title: 11 Guiding Light Trivia Quizzes (Questions and Answers)
data.meta_description: The best quizzes in this category as voted by visitors.
data.text:
1.

'Guiding Light' Sons And Daughters

Multiple Choice

10 Qns

This is a easy quiz if you have ever watched 'Guiding Light'. The answers will be all multiple choice. For 'Guiding Light' fans this quiz will be easy.

Easier, 10 Qns, dingbatalso, Aug 05 18

Easier

dingbatalso

Aug 05 18

4829 plays

2.

"Guiding Light's" Lewis Family

Multiple Choice

10 Qns

In the Lewis family, a cousin can become a step-brother, or a nephew or who knows what else?! See if you can figure it out.

Average, 10 Qns, thelawyer, May 12 08

Average

thelawyer

2097 plays

3.

Characters of "Guiding Light"

Multiple Choice

10 Qns

Here's a quiz on my favorite soap opera, "Guiding Light." It should be fairly easy for those who watch the show. This quiz is focused on characters who joined the show from 2000 - 2003. Good luck.

Average, 10 Qns, txflea, Jan 14 06

Average

txflea

2971 plays

4.

All About Springfield

Multiple Choice

15 Qns

This quiz is about the characters and storylines of the "Guiding Light". Have fun.

Average, 15 Qns, txflea, May 05 22

Average

txflea

May 05 22

2704 plays

5.

Guess The Character

Multiple Choice

10 Qns

I'll describe a character from the show and you tell me who.

Easier, 10 Qns, Kimdiesel, Aug 06 03

Easier

Kimdiesel

3311 plays

6.

Springfield Adoptions

Multiple Choice

10 Qns

This quiz is for long-time "Guiding Light" fans. See how many of these Springfield adoptees you can guess.

Easier, 10 Qns, thelawyer, Aug 05 18

Easier

thelawyer

Aug 05 18

1281 plays

7.

Extreme "Guiding Light" For True Fans

Multiple Choice

20 Qns

I have watched this show every day since 1999 and the questions are based on some of my favorite story lines. Some of the questions are rather easy and some you may have to think about carefully. Good Luck!

Tough, 20 Qns, Lauren2311, Aug 04 06

Tough

Lauren2311

1887 plays

8.

"Guiding Light" Pre-1999

Multiple Choice

15 Qns

I enjoyed the "Guiding Light" quiz that just went up so much that I thought I'd do one that concentrated on pre-1999 stuff. This quiz will go back as far as 1988, when I started watching!

Tough, 15 Qns, thelawyer, Aug 16 18

Tough

thelawyer

Aug 16 18

1905 plays

9.

The Light Fades

Multiple Choice

10 Qns

"Guiding Light" first aired on American radio in 1937 and moved to TV in 1952. After 72 years, the light has faded. This quiz is about the end of an era. All dates are American.

Average, 10 Qns, CStrange, Oct 12 09

Average

CStrange

384 plays

10.

Reva's Stalker

Multiple Choice

10 Qns

This quiz about the stalker storyline on "Guiding Light". It's pretty easy if you watch the show. Hope you enjoy!

Average, 10 Qns, yoreeder230, Aug 19 18

Average

yoreeder230

Aug 19 18

1584 plays
